is the global leader in eye care, dedicated to helping people see brilliantly.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Founded in 1945 by two pharmacists, Robert Alexander and William Conner, who combined the first syllables of their last names to call it, Alcon has a long history of industry-firsts, and each year commits a substantial amount in Research and Development to meet customer needs and patient demands. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"With 70-plus-year heritage, Alcon is the largest eye care device company in the world â€“ with complementary businesses in Surgical and Vision Care. A truly global company, Alcon works in over 70 countries and serves patients in more than 140 countries.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Alcon was acquired by Novartis in 2011, but in April 2019 Alcon became an independent entity again and gained leading positions in its primary domains - Surgical Equipment and Vision Care.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":52954,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ba1a9c83-4fd5-47a2-a931-8114a25514d2/01.2-Alcon-info.svg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ba1a9c83-4fd5-47a2-a931-8114a25514d2/01.2-Alcon-info.svg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"01.2-Alcon-info.svg\",\"name\":\"01.2-Alcon-info.svg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"svg+xml\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ba1a9c83-4fd5-47a2-a931-8114a25514d2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":316.0851674641149},\"extension\":\"svg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More info at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://investor.alcon.com/home/default.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Alcon for investors\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
